allow: Bash("C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\16\bin\psql.exe" -U postgres -d socratit_dev -c "SELECT id, title, description, topics, ""learningObjectives"", concepts FROM ""CurriculumUnit"" WHERE ""scheduleId"" IN (SELECT id FROM ""CurriculumSchedule"" ORDER BY ""createdAt"" DESC LIMIT 1) ORDER BY ""unitNumber"" LIMIT 3;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/16/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -d socratit_dev -c "SELECT id, title, LEFT(CAST(topics AS TEXT), 100) as topics_preview FROM ""CurriculumUnit"" ORDER BY ""createdAt"" DESC LIMIT 3;")
